mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_products (product_no, product_name, product_description, product_stock, product_price) VALUES (products_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{description}, #{stock}, #{price})
mapper.select:
SELECT product_no AS no, product_name AS name, product_description AS description, product_stock AS stock, product_price AS price, product_status AS status, product_fileName AS fileName, product_created_date AS createdDate, product_updated_date AS updatedDate
FROM shop_products
ORDER BY product_no DESC
